description: Overlooking the main square of this small village in the Lower Po valley, this restaurant prides itself on its love for local, traditional specialities such as cured meats, stuffed marubini pasta, goose and boiled meat dishes, with many recipes having been handed down over the years. If you’d like to take some food or wine home with you, there’s a well-stocked shop at the entrance.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Interesting wine list, Terrace
